Package org.osmdroid.samplefragments.events

Samples related to map events, such as zoom and pan, limiting scroll, and startup events

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MarkerDrag
    Based on osmbonuspacks tutorial for dragging markers.
    SampleAnimatedZoomToLocation  
    SampleAnimateTo
    https://github.com/osmdroid/osmdroid/issues/264 extends gridlines to provide visual confirmation Created by alex on 2/22/16.
    SampleLimitedScrollArea  
    SampleMapBootListener
    A quick tutorial on how to listen for when the map is ready to go
    issue 324 Created by alex on 6/4/16.

    used for testing this issue https://github.com/osmdroid/osmdroid/issues/248 Created by alex on 2/22/16.

    Created by alex on 10/4/16.

    Created by Dad on 10/28/2016.
